translation.Name: Easter Tablet #8
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_0: Here lies the site of the seal. If there is ever a need, the seal can be broken by gathering all 3 crystal bodies to this location.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_1: The soul of Hotu Matu'a, the oldest of them all, he sleeps in a chamber, far removed from everyone else, he can hear the ocean from his bed.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: The soul of Tuâ€˜u ko Iho sleeps where things are lost, and from where he was given life.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_3: The soul of Miru, tamer of fire, was disturbed, it is unknown where it lies.
